biotools.summary: CystAnalyser is a software tool for the automatic detection and quantification of cysts in Polycystic Kidney and Liver Disease, and other cystic disorders. It combines automatic image processing with a friendly graphical user interface (GUI) that allows researchers to supervise and easily correct the image processing before quantification. CystAnalyser is able to provide users the cystic index, the number of cysts and the cystic size profile.
